name: Glass Tower World
description:
Smash the tower of glass!
The game with physical collisions and gravity simulation.
You'll be addicted after your first tap!

- 300+ awesome levels
- large world map to explore
- no violence and simple rules, so even kids may play this game
- relaxing ambient music
- bright graphics
- very cool sounds of shattering glass
- amazing boosters

One of the best and simplest puzzles ever!
Gameplay is extremely easy and simple.
The tower is constructed of blocks that are different in size, shape, and color.
Your aim is to break all the blue blocks and to save as many red blocks as possible.
Sometimes you need to think about which block to break, but sometimes you need to act fast.
Blue blocks increase your score. Its amount depends on the size of the block. Red blocks decrease your score in the same way.
Also every broken red block subtracts one "life".

Due to the physical-based engine, every level can be completed in different ways.

Some blocks contain coins. When you break such a block, the coin takes off and rises near the screen's edge.
You should be quick to "catch" it by tapping it!
You may use coins to buy boosters and lives.
